title: My Masters' Nightmare Season 1, Ep. 8 "Questions"
description: Rita is inundated with questions from Frano:Why doesn't she have an Italian accent?Why can't she remember everything?How did she get to America?How did she become an FBI agent?Jagger instead is taking control back and becoming a master again. Can you guess who he's taking as a slave? Camila is going to be furious when she sees who Jagger is focusing on, while Matteo will want to kill Jagger for it. But, Jagger now has the power and will try to force Matteo into betraying Christo and the Padre with promises of giving this person back. Will it work?New additions to Episode 8: Sophia's and the Padre's viewpoints.
author: Marita A. Hansen
